meanings.definition: A band that goes around the nose of a horse and is part of the bridle.
meanings.sent1: The nosebands on the horse's bridle help control its movements.
meanings.sent2: The leather nosebands on the bridle were well-crafted and sturdy.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous horse tried to playfully shake off its nosebands during the ride.
meanings.sent4: The nosebands acted like a gentle guide, directing the horse along the trail.
meanings.sent5: The shiny silver nosebands gleamed in the sunlight, catching everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: A band that goes around the nose of a person to hold a mask or goggles in place.
meanings.sent1: She adjusted the nosebands of her mask to ensure a snug fit.
meanings.sent2: The elastic nosebands on the goggles kept them securely on his face.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly pretended his nosebands were a superhero mask, ready to save the day.
meanings.sent4: The nosebands of the mask were like loyal guards, protecting his face from dust.
meanings.sent5: The colorful nosebands added a fun touch to her otherwise plain mask.
